ServiceStatus.description:
服务状态。取值：

- Enabled：已开通。

- Disabled：已关闭。

InitialStatus.description:
初始化状态。取值：

- Pending：准备中。

- Finished：就绪。

400.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform this operation.
Mulit account ResourceCenter service is not enabled.

404.errorMessage: The resource directory for the account is not enabled.

409.errorMessage: ResourceDirectory Member Account is not authorized to perform this operation.

title: 查询跨账号资源搜索开通状态
